attributes.action: have all MP's expense investigated for fraud by police and an independant authority
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The MP's expenses issue has caused controversy throughout the whole of the UK; if it was the taxpayer or any normal citizen they would be arrested and tried by the state, so why should MP's be any different? I believe that all MP's reguardless of whether thay have tried to make amends (such as Hazel Blears)should be investigated too as they still stole from the tax payer,

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
